title: Emma Raducanu Loses Tennis Final in Romania
summary: Emma Raducanu, a British tennis player, lost a big tennis match called the Transylvania Open final in Romania. She played against Sorana Cirstea from Romania, who won easily with scores of 6-0 and 6-2. Raducanu only won two games in the whole match. She was tired because she had a long match the day before and wasn't feeling well. Cirstea played very well and won her fourth title in her career. Raducanu said she was happy to be in the final even though she lost. The match happened in Cluj-Napoca, Romania, and many people watched.
